title: Engineering Program Specialist - Mac
summary: At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. It’s the diversity of our people and their thinking that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do. When we bring everybody in, we can do the best work of our lives. Here, you’ll do more than join something — you’ll add something. Bring passion and dedication and there's no telling what you could accomplish here! The Greater China Mac Engineering Program Management (EPM) group is looking for a new team member who's to take the challenges and ready to fulfill the demands from multiple programs. The team is highly result oriented and working on exciting product development of Apple. As an Engineering Program Specialist (EPS), you will be directly working with both Greater China and US based EPM/EPSs, Hardware Engineering, Product Design, and our Contract Manufacturing (CM) partners to address logistic/material challenges and provide on-time risk assessment during engineering development builds.
description: This position is based in China for supporting engineering build activities and responsible for on-time delivery of in-coming (components, modules, enclosures, etc) and out-going materials (MLB, displays, systems, etc). The goals are to resolve all logistics and material issues along supply chain in order to secure program schedule and communicate logistics topics with program teams. -  Track point-to-point deliveries of engineering BOM (bill of materials) -  Drive day-to-day delivery readiness to meet overall program objectives -  Establish and optimize logistics process across worldwide supply chains -  Raise and resolve all shipping logistics related issues (custom delay, flight disruption, material shortage, etc.) -  Analyze and ensure production material Clear-to-Build
preferred_qualifications: Concept of international trading or customs operation, Experience in technology industry, electronic manufacturing, or new product program management
